title: 11: OBITCH is it Jeff or Geoff?
description:
Obitch, do we have a show for you. This week Madison shows off her pop culture knowledge with some bizarre celebrity funeral factoids, Spencer tells us a story from Australia about a surprise funeral guest, we’ve got some celebrity obituaries, and of course we’ve got some dumb.ass.criminals!! 
Follow along online: instagram.com/obitchuarypod
Write to us: obitpod@gmail.com
Sponsor: 
Wicked Clothes: Visit wickedclothes.com/obit for 10% off any purchase. 


Sources: 
http://content.time.com/time/business/article/0,8599,1811730,00.html#:~:text=Fredric%20Baur%20dreamed%20up%20the%20original%20Pringles%20can.,wanted%20to%20go%20to%20his%20grave%20with%20it
https://celebritytoob.com/10-bizarre-funerals-celebrities/ https://www.grunge.com/143068/famous-people-who-are-buried-in-unmarked-graves/
http://www.alfredhitchcock.com/life-and-legacy/biography/
https://www.riverfronttimes.com/newsblog/2021/08/25/elizabeth-cooke-stopped-medics-from-resuscitating-bobby-phillips-police
https://moron.com/florida-murder-imaginary-friend/
https://www.snopes.com/fact-check/not-dead-yet/
https://people.com/crime/australia-woman-shows-up-at-her-own-funeral-to-confront-her-husband-who-paid-to-have-her-killed/
https://www.cbsnews.com/news/cnn-chagrined-over-premature-obits/

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
